title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1191/2001 of 18 June 2001 amending Regulation (EC) No 1372/2000 establishing a forecast balance for the supply to the Canary Islands of milk and milk products
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 1191/2001
of 18 June 2001
amending Regulation (EC) No 1372/2000 establishing a forecast balance for the supply to the Canary Islands of milk and milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1601/92 of 15 June 1992 concerning specific measures for the Canary Islands with regard to certain agricultural products(1), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 2826/2000(2), and in particular Article 3(4) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) Commission Regulation (EC) No 2790/94(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1620/1999(4), in particular lays down detailed rules for the application of the specific arrangements for the supply of certain agricultural products to the Canary Islands.
(2) Commission Regulation (EC) No 1372/2000(5) establishes a supply balance for milk products for the Canary Islands. That supply balance may be revised where this proves necessary, and the quantities of products adjusted during the year within the overall quantity fixed in line with the region's requirements. In order to meet the Canary Islands' milk product requirements, the estimated quantities of such products in the forecast supply balance must be adjusted. The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1372/2000 should accordingly be amended.
(3) The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Management Committee for Milk and Milk Products,
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1372/2000 is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 2000.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 June 2001.
For the Commission
Franz Fischler
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 173, 27.6.1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ L 328, 23.12.2000, p. 2.
(3) OJ L 296, 17.11.1994, p. 23.
(4) OJ L 192, 24.7.1999, p. 19.
(5) OJ L 156, 29.6.2000, p. 21.
ANNEX
"ANNEX
Forecast supply balance for milk and milk products for the Canary Islands for the period 1 July 2000 to 30 June 2001
>TABLE>"
